named-native-query.name: ShowDetailView.getShow
named-native-query.query: SELECT s.show_id, s.scheduled_at, s.movie_id, s.movie_title, s.hall_id, s.hall_name FROM show AS s WHERE s.show_id = :show_id

named-native-query.name: ShowSummaryView.listShows
named-native-query.query: SELECT s.show_id, s.scheduled_at, s.movie_id, s.movie_title, s.hall_id, s.hall_name FROM show AS s ORDER BY s.id_ ASC OFFSET :offset FETCH NEXT :limit ROWS ONLY

named-native-query.name: ShowSummaryView.searchShows
named-native-query.query: SELECT s.show_id, s.scheduled_at, s.movie_id, s.movie_title, s.hall_id, s.hall_name FROM show AS s WHERE LOWER(s.movie_title) LIKE :filter_pattern OR LOWER(s.hall_name) LIKE :filter_pattern ORDER BY CASE WHEN LOWER(s.movie_title) LIKE :sort_pattern THEN 0 WHEN LOWER(s.hall_name) LIKE :sort_pattern THEN 1 ELSE 2 END ASC, s.movie_title ASC OFFSET :offset FETCH NEXT :limit ROWS ONLY

named-native-query.name: SeatView.listSeats
named-native-query.query: SELECT ss.seat_number, ss.status, ssb.booking_id AS booking_id, ssb.status AS booking_status FROM show_seat AS ss INNER JOIN show AS s ON s.id_ = ss.show_id_ LEFT OUTER JOIN booking AS ssb ON ssb.booking_id = ss.booking_id WHERE s.show_id = :show_id ORDER BY ss.index_ ASC
